mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_birth, member_phone, member_region, member_email, member_hi_sentence, member_profile_uuid, member_profile_path, member_profile_original_name, member_profile_size, member_profile_type) values(#{memberIdentification}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{region}, #{memberEmail}, #{hiSentence}, #{memberProfileUuid}, #{memberProfilePath}, #{memberProfileOriginalName}, #{memberProfileSize}, #{memberProfileType})
